definitions.definition: A precipitous decline in fortune ; death or rapid deterioration , as in status or wealth .
examples: Many economic and political reasons led to the downfall of the Roman Empire.

definitions.definition: The cause of such a fall; a critical blow or error .

main_definition: A precipitous decline in fortune ; death or rapid deterioration , as in status or wealth .
secondary_definitions: The cause of such a fall; a critical blow or error .
